AI News.music_prompt: Upbeat tech-focused instrumental background music with electronic elements, suitable for AI and technology news
AI News.description: Latest artificial intelligence news, breakthroughs, and industry developments

Tech Product Releases.music_prompt: Energetic and modern background music with tech-product showcase feel, upbeat and engaging
Tech Product Releases.description: New product launches, updates, and technology announcements

Tech News and Tech Culture.music_prompt: Creative and thoughtful background music with cultural depth, warm and engaging for discussion content
Tech News and Tech Culture.description: Technology industry news, trends, and cultural developments

Community Organizing.music_prompt: Inspiring and hopeful background music with community and grassroots organizing feel, motivational
Community Organizing.description: Grassroots organizing, community building, and civic engagement

Social Justice.music_prompt: Serious and dignified background music appropriate for social justice content, respectful and purposeful
Social Justice.description: Social justice issues, advocacy, and systemic change initiatives

Societal Culture Change.music_prompt: Thoughtful and contemplative background music for cultural discussion, reflective and nuanced
Societal Culture Change.description: Cultural shifts, social movements, and societal transformation
